item.description:
Partnership will be the keys to the kingdom in 2010. The recent sold out 100+ person New Year's event at Samadhi was such an example. Folks from the EnlightenNext, Samadhi, and the Integral communities all came out to transcend any differences and pool their strengths to create something that couldn’t have happened on its own!

In the spirit of this, the Integral Commons meetup group and EnlightenNext will further share our inner and outer space at Samadhi to engage in an evening of the Discovery Cycle – first in a meditation led by Rodrigo Tarraza, and then a reading from the Guru and the Pandit. In this dialogue, Ken Wilber and Andrew Cohen will explore their utopian vision of what a post-postmodern spiritual community would look like!

If you’d like to read the article before the evening:
http://www.enlightenn...

Admission is normally $15, but if you rsvp on the Integral Meetup site in advance, your cost will only be $10. I look forward to seeing you there!

Love,
Ted
item.name: The Guru and the Pandit
